---
order: 13
title:
  zh-CN: 范围选择器
  en-US: Range Picker
---

## zh-CN

通过 `RangePicker` 使用时间范围选择器。

## en-US

Use time range picker with `RangePicker`.

```jsx
import { TimePicker } from 'antd';

const { RangePicker } = TimePicker;

ReactDOM.render(
  <div>
    <RangePicker />
  </div>,
  mountNode,
);
```
